attributes.action: Emily Thornberry should resign as Shadow Defence Secretary and MP
attributes.background: Labour's new shadow defence secretary Emily Thornberry received donations from a law firm which was condemned over false claims British soldiers were involved in torture and murder in Iraq. Jeremy Corbyn's new frontbench appointment accepted £14,500 from Leigh Day & Co.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual MP is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
